alert.note: Alert for Fulton (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 03 at 12:25PM EST until March 08 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Kentucky...Missouri... Mississippi River at New Madrid affecting Mississippi, New Madrid and Fulton Counties. .The rise on the Mississippi River at New Madrid will crest Tomorrow and continue to fall into next week. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Mississippi River at New Madrid. * WHEN...Until late Tuesday evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:00 AM CST Thursday the stage was 34.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 35.0 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage Tuesday afternoon. - Flood stage is 34.0 feet. &&
